body_content.explanation: good-quality tea leaves picked from the youngest part of the tea plant:
examples: Very few people know their oolong from their orange pekoe.
Tea fans use terms such as FOP (Flowery Orange Pekoe) and TGFOP (Tippy Golden Flowery Orange Pekoe) when discussing different leaf grades.

body_content.explanation: a good-quality black tea (= dark tea of the type often drunk in North America and western Europe) made from these young leaves :
examples: She had started to drink herb tea instead of orange pekoe.
Organizers handed out doughnuts and hot cups of orange pekoe tea.
